**Black Friday Deals at [Parkinhost.com](http:// "Parkinhost.com")**

Avail up to 75% Off when you buy Annual plans and 50% OFF on Monthly plans


ParkInHost is an entity of DiggDigital known for its low-cost high-quality Unmanaged VPS and Dedicated hosting services in European DC's. 

Our motto was to provide quick support and assistance when clients require us. We support Via Live Chat, Skype, and Support ticket 24/7 and 365 days a year.

We have TTK - Transtelecom, Rascom, Globalnet, and Retn as ISP providers. **We have a seamless China route.**
